mapper.select: SELECT post_report.*, post.post_text, post.user_mail, post.status as post_status FROM post_report INNER JOIN post ON post_report.post_no = post.no ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT #{perPage} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #{perPage}) AS totalPages FROM post_report

SELECT reply_report.*, reply.comment, reply.user_mail , reply.post_no, post.status as post_status FROM reply_report INNER JOIN reply ON reply_report.reply_no = reply.no INNER JOIN post ON reply.post_no = post.no ORDER BY reply_report.no DESC LIMIT #{perPage} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #{perPage}) AS totalPages FROM post_report
mapper.update: UPDATE post_report SET status = status - 1, mod_date = NOW() WHERE no = #{reportIndex}
